topics.body:
"@And Brother I Hurt People":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/540115fa6368724af94b0100#post_540115fa6368724af94b0100
[bq="And Brother I Hurt People"]"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5401157e6368723ef2190000#post_5401157e6368723ef2190000

Speaking of Jontron, what's with all of this flack he's getting lately? What happened?[/bq]
SJW are pissed at him cause he said that he hates how they're committing blanket internet censorship to silence anyone that disagrees with them on sites like 4chan, tumblr, reddit and numerous other websites.

If you're wondering what the fuck I'm talking about that Zoe Quinn woman put into light that SJW have massive control over the internet to scary levels and cause the internet isn't taking this shit lying down and letting us be completely rubbed out they're calling Jontron numerous names.

Tl:dr; SJW have a massive amount of control over the internet and cause Jontron is on the side that opposes them censoring the internet they're attacking him.
